entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pinawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 35. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
